attributes.action: Give northern England a vote for indipendence from London
attributes.additional_details: Because there a disgrace and only act against the peoples best interest only capable of mirroring American capitalism slavery noingly and willingly doing so for there own personal big payday
attributes.background: Give northern England it's indipendence if southern England wants to be slaves to capitalism dept and the USA let them such retardedness cruelty and wickedness imposed by conservatives in the south will never be forgiven

rejection.details: We understand you'd like part of the UK to have a referendum on independence, but we're not sure what you'd like to be included in 'the North'.
